title: Nvidia | System Software Engineer Offer
content:
Education: Btech in CS 
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: SDE1 - 2.5 Yrs in Product Based Company 
Current CTC :25 LPA
Company: Nvidia
Title/Level: System Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary:21 LPA (Fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: They said we only give SB to immediate joinees
Bonus: NA
Stocks - 28 LPA(4 yrs)
Total comp (Salary + Stock): 28 LPA
Benefits:standard Nvidia benefits, Free food, cab facility etc

Is it a lowball for nvidia? Please add your inputs. Considering current market scenario I am thinking to join Nvidia as it's a safe place.

title: Atlassian | Principal Engineer (P6) | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in CSE (One of the top private colleges, not sure which "tier")
Years of Experience: 10.5 years
Prior Experience: A top Indian SaaS product company
Date of the Offer: Nov-2023
Company: Atlassian
Title/Level: P6
Location: Bangalore
Base: 90L
Variable: 20% of base
JB: 15L
Stock bonus: $180k over 4 years
First year total comp (Base + Variable + JB + Stock): 1.6cr
Benefits: Standard Atlassian benefits
Prev: ~83-88L (63 fixed + ~20-25 yearly stocks)

title: Google | L4 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in CSE tier 2
Years of Experience: 7 years 8months
Prior Experience: Salesforce 
Date of the Offer: 2023
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 31,00,000
Stock bonus: $60k over 4 years
Bonus: Target bonus 0-15% of salary
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 50 LPA
Benefits: Google standard one
Got other offer from USA based startup with 60 base and other comp benefits. 
Disappointed with the G lowball number. do they always lowball? 
Also got fired from salesforce due to performance, do they rehire in different team?

title: Amazon | SDE 2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 1 College - IIT
Years of Experience: 7+
Prior Experience: JIRA company (Atlassian) 
Date of the Offer: 2023
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: INR 54,00,000
Bonuses: INR 23,00,000 (1st year) + INR 22,00,000 (2nd year)
Relocation benefit : 1.5 Lpa
Stock bonus: 600 stocks vesting over 4 years
Total comp  (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 87,50,000
Benefits: Standard Amazon benefits
Other details : Was unemployed for a month after getting pip from Atlassian. Happy to back on track
Had competing offer from series A startup
